name: Untitled Table Top Village Builder
description:
Hi guys,

I tried to create a game for the Side Quest #4 game jame with the quest of "One Room". Link: https://itch.io/jam/side-quest-4 

Unfortunately, I started late in the jam (like less than 24 hours left late) so I was not able to complete a fully playable game but I have the mechanics working. I plan to continue developing the game from here onwards so for now have a go at what I have completed so far.

Instructions:

Build a village using only what buildings are provided in the table and reach a worthy title of a big village with 500+ population.

- Small House [Wood:  2] [Stone: 4] [Population: 0] - Adds 5 population

- Medium House [Wood:  8] [Stone: 16] [Population: 0] - Adds 10 population

- Large House [Wood:  32] [Stone: 64][Population: 0] - Adds 20 population

- Quarry [Wood:  0] [Stone: 10][Population: 5] - Adds 5 Stones every 15-20 seconds

- Forester [Wood:  10] [Stone: 0][Population: 5] -  Adds 5 Wood every 15-20 seconds

Cheers!

Necther Louie
